item.title: Report X-2023081933
item.description:
Report X-2023081933

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at hazmat during day sort in plastic bin. DescribePack: Inspection showed jerrycan of "ZEP CONCENTRATED INDUSTRIAL PURPLE DEGREASER" to have small puncture near bottom, most likely caused from being dropped. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be disposed of in salvage drum, as there is no way to ship jerrycan without leaking.

item.title: Report X-2023081919
item.description:
Report X-2023081919

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: WAYNE
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE UNLOADED FROM TRAILER AT DESTINATION STATION. PACKAGE HANDLER TRAINER IN UNDLOAD NOTICED WET PART OF PACKAGE AND CALLED QA OVER. PLACED IN QA HAZMAT CAGE TO PREVENT FURTHER DAMAGE. DescribePack: ONE BOTTOM CORNER OF OUTER PACKAGE CRUSHED. 2 BOTTLES HAD LOOSE CAPS AND LEAKED. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE CLOSURES RE-CLOSED. PLACED IN VENTILATED HAZMAT CAGE AT BACK OF BUILDING.

Report X-2023081595

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Shipping box crushed while in transit causing In The Swim Calcium Hypochlorite 50lb pail bottom to crack. Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing. DescribePack: Shipping box crushed while in transit causing In The Swim Calcium Hypochlorite 50lb pail bottom to crack. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing.

item.title: Report X-2023081284
item.description:
Report X-2023081284

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-17
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at hazmat during sunrise sort in a plastic bin. DescribePack: Inspection showed package of "NU-BRITE CONDENSER COIL CLEANER" was wet and torn with internal leakage, from a loose cap. Damage most likely caused from being dropped or mishandled. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be returned to shipper in a salvage drum, unless otherwise stated.

item.title: Report X-2023081276
item.description:
Report X-2023081276

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-16
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the sunrise sort, the package arrived at the hazmat cage in a container leaking. Upon inspection, the plastic pail containing "Decon Labs Ethanol 200 Proof" was found to have a puncture at the bottom of the pail. It was placed upside down and into a salvage drum to be sent back to the shipper unless otherwise. DescribePack: The pail failure was due to a small puncture at the bottom of the plastic pail. It was due to a equipment mishap in the loading process. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: The plastic pail was placed upside down and the puncture site covered into a salvage drum.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived during day sort in plastic bin. DescribePack: Inspection showed package of "RAPICIDE PA" was wet and torn, from 2 inner containers with loose caps. Damage most likely caused from being dropped or mishandled. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be returned to shipper in a plastic salvage drum, unless otherwise stated.

item.title: Report X-2023080946
item.description:
Report X-2023080946

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-25
  • City: NEWARK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Package was brought to the attention of the spill cleanup specialist at our Newark, NJ Ramp location. Package was seen to have wet corners which indicated leakage from inside the package. Package contained UN 1593 DICHLOROMETHANE and consisted of 1 glass bottle packed for 4L in a fiberboard box. Dunnage was not immediately reported with package, however, packing peanuts may have dissolved when product leaked. It was reported upon inspection that the bottle inside of the box had shattered. It was not reported how damage occurred to the inner container. Package was instructed to be contained in a steel salvage package and package to be destroyed as contents were a total loss.
